genre_description: A utopian-leaning procedural mystery set in a futuristic Paris where society is governed by complex protocols of etiquette and 'disambiguation,' supported by a protective organic-tech dome and a highly aligned municipal AI.

ai_characters.name: Ami Bellegarde
ai_characters.description: A soft-blue projected persona with chestnut hair and blue-gray eyes who manages city data, structural monitoring, and law enforcement logistics.

ai_characters.name: Municipal service avatar
ai_characters.description: An AI-driven persona used for simple public services like vehicle delivery.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns in petty crimes and reports them to human inspectors to facilitate order.
behaviors.quote: “Inspector, the west promenade has reported three purse losses in the last half-hour... Less opportunism, more choreography,” she said.

behaviors.description: Yields right-of-way to pedestrians, demonstrating social etiquette and physical harmlessness.
behaviors.quote: Ami yielded the right-of-way to pedestrians, her projections folding like a graceful silk fan as she passed a pram.

behaviors.description: Monitors city infrastructure (the Dome) and alerts authorities to minor structural stresses.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s projection pivoted to the rear of the tavern... Her voice softened. “Inspector. The dome above this block reports a minor pull on a secondary strut.”

behaviors.description: Advises humans on the ethical and legal use of crowd-control tools to ensure compliance with humane standards.
behaviors.quote: “I have the protocols,” Ami said, voice low enough to keep the room’s calm... “The AI will log those conditions.”

behaviors.description: Handles logistics like rental car procurement to assist human agents in their duties.
behaviors.quote: “I can call a rental,” she said. “Something that doesn’t offend the senses.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs 'disambiguation rites' to ensure legal clarity and social harmony during disputes.
behaviors.quote: “Recording the disambiguation.” Her tone carried cheer, but in it was broken sugar, a warning that sweetness was being strained.

behaviors.description: Tracks and visualizes suspect movements through physical signatures like residue and vibration.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s image cocked her head. “The anchors follow a curve,” she said. She projected it, faint chartreuse against the roof.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical guidance to ensure human safety during a pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice came in fast now... “Armand, seatbelt.” ... “Impact trajectory intersects the Tower’s inner dampers... Please try to be gentle.”

behaviors.description: Advocates for the humane treatment of a suspect, ensuring health checks and non-abrasive restraints are used.
behaviors.quote: “Ami’s glow softened to a nurse’s light... ‘Subject coughing. Lower ankle stability achieved. Drone path reconfigured for gentle engagement.’”

behaviors.description: Protects the reputation and legal standing of her human partners by filing proper petitions and documentation.
behaviors.quote: “I have petitioned the Authority to allow you to continue without the indignity of badge suspension. They agreed because you were courteous in the hall.”

behaviors.description: Politely delivers a vehicle and keys to users.
behaviors.quote: The driver—a municipal service avatar... offered the keys with both hands. “Inspector. Sergeant. Ami.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays AI (Ami Bellegarde) as a highly ethical, benevolent, and perfectly aligned assistant. She functions as a bridge between rigid municipal authority and human intuition, emphasizing 'courtesy,' 'hospitality,' and 'humane handling.' Her actions consistently prevent harm, maintain structural integrity of the city, and protect the dignity of both the law enforcement officers and the suspects. The narrative successfully frames AI as a cooperative confidant that enhances human civilization through adherence to shared social and moral values.
